kese wethath 1974di merata purawidya aagnyapanatha yatathe rakshitha sthanayak bawata pathkala galla kotuwa loka urumayak lesa yunesko sanwidhanaya wisin prakashayata pathkarana ladde 1988 wasarediya. 16 wani siyawasedi pruthugisin wisin idikarana lada galla kotuwa pasuwa 17 wani siyawasedi landesin wisin thawath pulul kota idikarana lada namuth 1796 wasaredi merata balaya alla gath ingrisi jathikayan wisin 1876 wasaredi galla krikat kridanganaya idikala bawata ithihasaye sandahanya.

"hari, hari, mama parajaya bara gannawa."

mama kalin yaluwela hitiyaya , eya dala giyaya ,eya amathaka karanna bariya ..kiya kiya sampradayika bayilawak gahannane , oya man gana hariyata danne na ..mata oyage athithayen wadak na."

ema nauka idiri dina kihipayedi libiyawa wetha langawimata niyamithawa thibe.

kochchara nam prabala praharayakda kiwwoth lakshmanwa pandu yawimen ayin kala.
ehenam ada kotasa balalama inna.
anathurak wenna puluwan.
aanduwa thakku mukku weyi..”
